text: 12.32: Mt 11.19; Ru 12.10; Zo 7.12; 7.52; 1 T 1.13Guma maaŋ muuŋgip, buna mbatɨga thuen Fhe Bakɨmen Guma Guara suaŋgirga, Fhe Bakɨme mba guma buneŋ, ana ne vhɨzgirga. Guma buna mbatɨgen ana Ŋina Ŋaara suaŋgirga, mba guma, Fhe Bakɨme, ana ana Ŋina Ŋaara suaŋgi buna mbatɨgeŋ, ana ntige ne vhɨzgirga fhu, ana zumgum vhɨra ne vhɨzgirga fhu.”
